title: Check Out our Floor to Ceiling Windows!

posting_body: Now offering social distance and virtual touring options!
Welcome to Trailpoint at the Woodlands
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 855 Sq.
Ideally located in The Woodlands, TX, the neighborhood surrounding Trailpoint at The Woodlands has so much to offer.
Entertainment, restaurants, schools, & services combine to create a conveniently placed home.

Built-in Microwave, In-home Washers and Dryers, Granite Countertops, Walk-in Closets, Dishwasher, Designer Finishes and Lighting, Upgraded Carpeting, Dry Bar*, Built-in Bookshelves*, Wood-style Flooring, Fireplaces*, Upgraded Kitchens and Baths, Disposal, Custom Espresso Cabinets, Extra Storage*, Balcony/Patio, Ceiling Fans

Preferred Employee Program, On-Site Management, Pet Spa, Outdoor Patio Deck, Laundry Room, Fishing Pond, 24-hour Emergency Maintenance, Fitness Center, WiFi, iLounge, Jacuzzi, Outdoor Kitchen, Saltwater Pool, Walking and Biking Trails, Ample Parking, Scenic Views, Online Payments & Service Requests, Bike Share Program*, Spa, Dog Park, Resident Clubhouse, Picnic Area, Park-like Setting, Firepit
